title: Большое переселение
overview: In the new reality show "The Big Relocation", the village family of the Morozovs will challenge the most glamorous and large family of show business - the family of Dzhigan and Oksana Samoilova. The Morozovs will go to live in the luxurious Dzhigan mansion, and the Dzhigan family will go to the village "apartments" of the Morozovs. Will those who are used to a luxurious life be able to adapt to the countryside? And will those who have never seen luxury be able to survive in luxury conditions? TNT will swap the two families and check out what came of it.
